data.meta_description:
805 likes, 1 comments - sharegrid on December 10, 2023: "‚ÄúOnce Upon a Time ... in Hollywood‚Äù (2019) 

Directed by Quentin Tarantino
Cinematography by Robert Richardson

Camera & Lens:
Aaton A-Minima
Arriflex 435, Panavision Primo, C-, E-, T-Series and Ultra Speed Golden Lenses
Bolex Camera
Panavision Panaflex Millennium XL2, Panavision Primo, C-, E-, T-Series, Ultra Speed Golden, Standard Speed, Ultra Speed MKII, Cooke Varotal and Angenieux Lenses

Aspect Ratio:
1.33 : 1 (Bounty Law, Interview Segment, Operazione Dyn-O-Mite!, & Red Apple Cigarettes Commercial)
1.85 : 1 (The 14 Fists of McCluskey)
2.39 : 1

Negative Format:
16 mm (Kodak Ektachrome 100D 7285)
35 mm (Kodak Vision3 200T 5213, Vision3 500T 5219)
8 mm (Kodak Ektachrome 100D 7294)

Cinematographic Process:
Digital Intermediate (4K) (master format)
Panavision (anamorphic) (source format)
Spherical (source format) (some scenes)
Super 8 (source format) (one scene)

Printed Film Format:
35 mm (partial blow-up) (Kodak Vision 2383)
70 mm (blow-up) (Kodak Vision 2383)
D-Cinema
